survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employees' coffee consumption habits and preferences in the workplace to improve office amenities and employee satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you consume coffee during work hours?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options are clear and cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you consume coffee during work hours?

questions.question_text: What type of coffee do you typically consume at work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with optional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: What type of coffee do you typically consume at work? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of coffee at work?
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with optional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice of coffee at work?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of coffee provided at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for single-choice selection. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of coffee provided at your workplace?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the coffee amenities at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the coffee amenities at your workplace?
